changeSphereXEngine(address).details: Changes the address of the SphereX engine.       This is also used to enable SphereX protection, which is disabled       when the engine address is 0.

changeSphereXOperator(address).details: Changes the address of the SphereX operator.

pendingSphereXAdmin().details: Returns the current pending admin address, which is able to call      acceptSphereXAdminRole to become the admin.

sphereXAdmin().details: Returns the current admin address, which is able to change the operator.

transferSphereXAdminRole(address).details: Set pending admin to `newAdmin`, allowing it to call       `acceptSphereXAdminRole()` to receive the admin role.
